text: remain in highschool we have barely seen
each other between high school and now
we went out for lunch
Xavier told me that he was really into
food I told him I was really into wine
after about three four years Sunday the
question was possible how about if we
turn to our own restaurant that was
basically the initial spark and I
created altar I knew would have to be
chef driven the best chef in town in my
opinion at the time was Brad to kill
words they didn't take much to convince
him Brad had immediately a very clear
idea of what the menu would look like
for this space Laidback great food great
wine simple atmosphere without
jeopardizing service and quality when I
read the four star review we received
from the Miami Herald last year for me
it was a very magical moment she
understood what we set ourselves out to
do here at the space for our patron is
complete experience can't be that you
serve good food but you know you don't
have a good wine list or the service
wasn't good it has to be a combination
of the whole thing so the next day you
wake up and you say I had a wonderful
meal yesterday and it's the whole you
know the whole experience
[Music]
